response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth exceeds $10,000, but I am willing to consider your offer. To make this transaction attractive for both parties, I propose a price of $15,000. If this aligns with your expectations or if you're interested in discussing further, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with someone who appreciates its qualities as much as I do.", "product_price": 15000}
